TestCase.name: testScalarFunctionAccess
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(_c0=[org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().my], _c1=[CAST(org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().clazz):INTEGER], _c2=[org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().my], _c3=[CAST(org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().clazz):INTEGER]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]])

Calc(select=[org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().my AS _c0, CAST(org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().clazz) AS _c1, org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().my AS _c2, CAST(org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$200fff80f39e0ec59f242bcc0ef9279e().clazz) AS _c3]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testMultiFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=(MOD($0, 2), 1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($1, 2)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b], where=[((a > 0) AND (b < 2) AND (MOD(a, 2) = 1))]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testMultipleFlatteningsTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a$_1=[$0._1], a$_2=[$0._2], c=[$2], b$_1=[$1._1], b$_2=[$1._2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a._1 AS a$_1, a._2 AS a$_2, c, b._1 AS b$_1, b._2 AS b$_2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNestedFlattening
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a$_1=[$0._1], a$_2=[$0._2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]])
Calc(select=[a._1 AS a$_1, a._2 AS a$_2, b]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testSelectAggregation
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_MAX(max$1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0, Partial_MAX(b) AS max$1]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectAggregationFromGroupedTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{2}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c], select=[c, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectAllFieldsFromGroupedTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 2}]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, c], select=[a, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, c], select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromAggregatedPojoTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, 2)]) +- LogicalProject(word=[$0], frequency=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(word, frequency)]]])

Calc(select=[word, CAST(2:BIGINT) AS frequency], where=[(EXPR$0 = 2)]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[word], select=[word, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[word]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[word], select=[word, Partial_SUM(frequency) AS sum$0]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(word, frequency)]]], fields=[word, frequency])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromGroupedTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 2}]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, c], select=[a, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, c], select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[k], select=[k, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[k]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[k], select=[k, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, org$apache$flink$table$planner$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$MyHashCode$$1945176195778b1bff1a30c41ce16445(c) AS k]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromGroupedTableWithNonTrivialKey
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], k=[UPPER($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[k], select=[k, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[k]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[k], select=[k, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, UPPER(c) AS k]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFunction
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(_c0=[hashCode($2)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])
Calc(select=[MyHashCode$(c) AS _c0, b]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])
